description:
This course will teach you how to make a $1,000 with an email list of 1,000 people. It will teach you how yo grow a list of 1,000 people. How to also make money instantly with your list.

Who This Course Is For:

  • People who want to start making money as a secondary income and those that want to make it into a permanent income stream
  • People who are already in affiliate marketing , but want to make more

Do You Have Questions About What You Will Get From The Course?

Send me a private message with any questions you might be wondering about the course, and I'll tell you whether the course will help your particular situation or not.

How The Course Is Structured

The course is one to two hours to complete, as i want you to spend valuable hours building your business. Its about 20+ lectures

What You Will Get From The Course

  • You will have a very solid understanding of how to grow a list
  • How to design a landing page and what makes a great template
  • Make money instantly with your list
  • List relationship the key to continuing to have a strong email list

The course is broken down into SIX PARTS

PART1: Introduction and course expectations

PART2: Dream Niche - How to find the right market to sell products

PART3: Landing Pages - What is a landing page , how to design one with no technical knowledge, how to outsource it and what makes a killer landing page. What autoresponders you should use to capture emails and send emails

PART4: Traffic - How to get free or paid traffic to generate leads to your landing page and grow your list.

PART5: List relationship - How to make sure you send the right emails to your list at the right time and also balance the different types of emails.

Personal Relationship

In addition to the course lectures, you get my help and advice! Students are able to start discussions and message me with through private messages and through the discussion board.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

MONEY BACK GUARANTEE

The course comes with an unconditional, Udemy backed, 30 day money-back guarantee so you can try the course risk free. This is not just a guarantee, it's my personal promise to you that you will succeed ... just like my thousands of other Udemy students.
